data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta 2
data.expected_result: You should be redirected to your friend list.
data.short_description: Discord crashes when having roles permissions opened while deleting the server
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server - Open the server settings - Go to `Roles` - Click on any role - Keep this section opened and delete the server with other device at the same time
